item.title: 2022 New Year's Resolutions
item.description: System In past years I’ve had mixed success with New Year’s Resolutions. A resolution gave me the motivation to move to Paris — I’ve also had years where I achieved nothing I set out to do.

item.title: Best of 2021
item.description: These are books, visual media and music I properly engaged with for the first time this year. I’d recommend all of them!

item.title: Phone Setup

item.title: Autumn squash and lentil pasta
item.description: The sauce can probably serve four people if you make enough pasta and serve with a side salad or some bread.
